message.body: By any chance, are you at Harrah's?
I'm here for a concert with my mom. And I'm bored, and it's kind of awkward hahah. You should be here!
Aw I'm sorry. Not there today.

I was cold, and just tired. Wasn't feeling it. My sister and other people tried to make me dance (and I did a little out of compliance hahah) but it just wasn't the night. So therefore I came across as awkward. Overall, it was a night. I'm home, comfy, and in my jammies now. How are you?
I had some friends over. Played some board games. Gotta love game night. lol.
Hellz yeah! We had game night with pastries two Saturdays ago at Brenda's. I go nuts!!!
